SELECT t.textbook_name, sum( CASE WHEN de.preset_position = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS decid1, sum( CASE WHEN de.preset_position = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS decid2, sum( CASE WHEN de.preset_position = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS decid3, sum( CASE WHEN de.preset_position = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS decid4, sum( CASE WHEN dpp.chosen_position =1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS dp1, sum( CASE WHEN dpp.chosen_position =2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS dp2, sum( CASE WHEN dpp.chosen_position =3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS dp3, sum( CASE WHEN dpp.chosen_position =8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS dp4 FROM dec_position de
LEFT JOIN textbook t ON t.id = de.textbook_id LEFT JOIN declaration d ON de.declaration_id = d.id left join dec_position_published dpp on dpp.declaration_id=d.id LEFT JOIN material m ON m.id = d.material_id LEFT JOIN org o ON o.id = d.org_id left join org_user oi on oi.org_id =o.id WHERE oi.id=${userId} AND m.id = ${material_id} and d.online_progress!=0 GROUP BY t.id HAVING ( decid1 >= 1 OR decid2 >= 1 OR decid3 >= 1 OR decid4 >= 1 )
